projects.name: AppBrain
projects.description: Knowledge orchestrator rollout for customer app

conversations.user: We need to port the timeline view to the new orchestrator deployment.
conversations.assistant: Reuse the AppBrain release checklist. Start with the dual-write scaffold, then cut over after the smoke tests succeed.

conversations.user: How did we integrate the Postgres change feed during the previous release?
conversations.assistant: We buffered to S3 for 24h and replayed chunks with idempotent upserts. The AppBrain launch doc has the SQL snippet.

conversations.user: What was the fix for the TypeError crash in the context chunker?
conversations.assistant: We patched the tokenizer fallback to guard against empty arrays. See BugFixer incident INC-204 for the patch steps.

conversations.user: Remind me how we summarized long LLM conversations for the audit export.
conversations.assistant: Use the session_log_collector CLI to batch compress logs, then export via cmd_export with the audit tag.
